definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: The LORD finds us enough reasons for prayer, and we ought to thank Him that it is so.
sentences.chinese: 上帝樂意聽我們的瑣碎絮語，我們也該爲此獻上感謝。

sentences.english: As an observer to this culture, it seems generally trivial and trying.
sentences.chinese: 本片作爲這種文化的觀察者，便顯得瑣碎及令人煩厭。

sentences.english: We spent the weekend pottering around the house.
sentences.chinese: 我們週末做一些瑣碎的家務事。

sentences.english: She loves to potter in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡在花園裏幹一些瑣碎活。

sentences.english: Don't know why to be always written by some affair Raos of pettinesses recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近不知道爲什麼總是被一些瑣碎的事情擾着。

sentences.english: The sand is the small stuff.
sentences.chinese: 沙子麼，就如一些瑣碎的小事。

sentences.english: Loose ends can feel like snares, creating tangles in your path.
sentences.chinese: 瑣碎事項就像是陷阱，在你的道路上製造混亂。

sentences.english: Do I know my pettiness without comparison?
sentences.chinese: 沒有比較我會知道自己的瑣碎嗎？

sentences.english: They do not dwell on the trivialities or the details.
sentences.chinese: 他們不仔細考慮細節的瑣碎部分。

sentences.english: From now I leave off all petty decorations.
sentences.chinese: 從今起我要拋棄一切瑣碎的裝飾。

sentences.english: She said people's concerns have been unjustly trivialized.
sentences.chinese: 她認爲公衆的關注點被不公正的瑣碎化。

sentences.english: It's useless to fire away with such trivial details.
sentences.chinese: 喋喋不休地談這些瑣碎細節是無用的。

sentences.english: Lobular flowers and plants can let host into a trivial situation.
sentences.chinese: 小葉花草會讓主人陷入瑣碎的境地。

sentences.english: It is through the ordinary duties and labors of life that the fabric of society is woven.
sentences.chinese: 社會是一張網，縱橫交錯著生活和工作中的種種瑣碎。

sentences.english: And your energy will be wasted on trivial pursuits.
sentences.chinese: 你的能量將會浪費在瑣碎的事上。

definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
too busy/to have no time for/fully occupied
to sketch in light shades/to play down/to deemphasize (idiom)
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
